desc: Fieldstone Coffee Roasters is a small batch roastery among the rolling hills of beautiful West Hunterdon County that includes a roasting house, a cupping room, and tea blending room.

layout.text:
4203 Durham Road Ottsville, PA
NEW SUMMER HOURS! Now through Labor Day!
Monday- Thursday 7-3, Friday 7-8p, Saturday 8-8p.
Sundays Private Events only
Patio, Curbside, Dine In, or Takeout
*The Roastery is always open for online ordering and shipping for all your bulk coffee beans, and loose leaf tea needs. Scroll down to check it out! Use Code: GOAT22 at check out for free shipping over $70.00, or OTTSVILLE for free local pick up, or FLEMINGTON for market pickup on Sundays.
